elevator_pitch: Courtroom5 enables the Personal Practice of Law for people handling serious lawsuits on their own. Millions of middle-class Americans struggle through debt collection, home foreclosure, wrongful termination, and other civil claims each year without legal representation. The Courtroom5 platform offers them AI-powered procedural guidance, claims analysis, legal research, and document assembly - all the work needed to interpret, apply and argue the law - along with access to affordable limited-scope legal services as needed. Unrepresented litigants often reach out to local legal aid long before discovering justice tech providers. Legal aid programs should consider referring those they can't serve to vetted justice tech providers, or in the alternative, license these solutions to provide them in-house to clients they can't fully serve.
primary_users: The primary users of Courtroom5's PPL are unrepresented civil litigants handling serious claims in U.S. federal and state courts.

elevator_pitch: ZAFlegal.com is a free legal AI linked to real attorneys. It helps people get their bearings on their situation and connects them to local lawyers when needed. Our ability to service various legal needs is continuously growing. Currently, the platform is best suited for Personal Injury cases and Immigration cases.
